body: Trail Planning:  Cheeseboro Accessible Trail       Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area is planning an accessible trail and trailhead parking enhancements at Cheeseboro Canyon. The planning map and matrix of public comments are available for your review.      Download planning documents and maps of the proposed Cheeseboro Accessible Trail (pdf-2.5 M)      Download Public Comment Matix (pdf-22kb)
title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Cheeseboro Accessible Trail
